meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the June 12, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize the ratification of a service contract for emergency repairs and modernization of the four elevators within the Hall Arts Garage
agenda_items.description: K & M Elevator, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $755,980.00 - Financing: Capital Construction Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Juanita Rodriguez v. The City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Cause No. CC-23-00619-A - Not to exceed $35,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Jose Posada v. City of Dallas, Texas
agenda_items.description: Cause No. CC-22-01655-A - Not to exceed $130,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize the acceptance of a grant from the Texas Veterans Commission Fund for Veterans' Assistance
agenda_items.description: In the amount of $50,000.00 for continuation of the South Oak Cliff Community Court - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing: 2024-2025 TVC-Veteran Treatment Court Grant Fund

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the selection of an underwriting syndicate for the issuance of bonds related to the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas Venue Project
agenda_items.description: Financing: No cost consideration to the City

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the execution of the First Amendment to Revolving Credit Agreement with State Street Bank and Trust Company
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $278,000 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds, Series 2024A
agenda_items.description: In the amount of $14,175,000 to the Texas Water Development Board - Not to exceed $71,000 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Stormwater Drainage Management Fund

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds, Series 2024B
agenda_items.description: In the amount of $90,090,000 to the Texas Water Development Board - Not to exceed $250,000 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Stormwater Drainage Management Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize the acceptance of a loan from the Texas Water Development Board for low-cost financial assistance
agenda_items.description: In an amount up to $14,175,000; acceptance of a grant from the Texas Water Development Board in an amount up to $2,500,712 - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City

financial_items.description: Service contract for emergency repairs and modernization of elevators
Settlement of lawsuit Juanita Rodriguez v. The City of Dallas
Settlement of lawsuit Jose Posada v. City of Dallas
Grant from Texas Veterans Commission Fund for Veterans' Assistance
First Amendment to Revolving Credit Agreement
Issuance and sale of Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds, Series 2024A
Issuance and sale of Drainage Utility System Revenue Bonds, Series 2024B
Loan from Texas Water Development Board
Grant from Texas Water Development Board
